title: Darius late game. Just read.
body:
Every ranked game I played against a Darius in late game team fights he always I'm not even joking always got a Quadra or Triple kill and the thing was they were absolute trash they lost lane super hard and they get a triple or quad and the chats going wild. All you do is sping around and ult when you see the mark... 
The reset of ult is really fucking stupid. He is already strong with bleed and then he has a reset with ult? 
Please nerf Darius.

replies.body: nerf darius?! lol hes pretty damn weak right now actually. his changes compared to garen and skarner are nothing. Darius will get slight buffs in the near future  guaranteed. hes not nearly as strong as he needs to be, to be a viable pick consistantly
Yeah, compared to them. Garen is disgustingly broken.
Garen is and always was friend...

Not really, he's gotten some nerfs. Skarner is the really broken one. I charged in 1v3 at the enemy because they were near my spire, I was 1 full item and 2 levels behind.. I killed two and sent their Vayne screaming back to the fountain as fast as she could run.
Your one of those people that doesn't read at all but say shit on the first thing they see which is the title in your case.
